sn46.12:1.1: “Suriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—arunuggam;
sn46.12:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sattannam bojjhanganam uppadaya etam pubbangamam etam nimittam, yadidam—kalyanamittata.
sn46.12:1.3: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham—satta bojjhange bhavessati, satta bojjhange bahulikarissati.
sn46.12:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto satta bojjhange bhaveti satta bojjhange bahulikaroti?
sn46.12:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn46.12:2.3: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.12:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti”ti.
